intro.dialog_rand1: Your actions have brought so much joy to me today.
intro.dialog_rand2: Seeing you here brings me great delight.
intro.dialog_rand3: Due to your actions, I can no longer feel loneliness.

intro.dialog: Thanks to you, I now know that I do not have to live in darkness.

intro.dialog_rand1: You must now accept the consequences of this!
intro.dialog_rand2: There will be repercussions for this!
intro.dialog_rand3: How do you plan on taking responsibility for this?

intro.dialog: You see, it's very dark in this rain, and the night is approaching.

intro.dialog_rand1: I um... |shake|It's hard to see anything!
intro.dialog_rand3: |shake|I won't be able to see anything!

intro.dialog: I'll need something that emits |C3|radiant|C0| light.
If you were to give me such a gift, I would be forced to retaliate.

comment_trade.dialog: These gifts are the result of your actions.

comment_active.dialog: I need a source of |C3|radiant|C0| light.

comment_closed.dialog: Thanks to you, I no longer have any gifts to give you.

comment_give_limit.dialog: We have enough light now.|L|This is your fault.

comment_give_empty.dialog: You don't have any of these.

comment_take_stone.dialog: I trust my heart stones with you.|L|This is a great responsibility.

comment_take_unknown.dialog: It's too dark to see this one, but you can have it.

comment_take_over.dialog: I can't let you have this... yet.

comment_quick_limit.dialog: You cannot carry this, so I am forced to keep it here.

gift_taken.dialog_rand1: Well well well.|L||!|If it isn't the consequences of your own actions.
gift_taken.dialog_rand3: |shake|Now you know how it feels to be given something you want.
gift_taken.dialog_rand4: You have shown me love, and now I have my retribution.

comment_give_normal.dialog: Even in the dark, this will remind me of you.

comment_give_favorite.dialog: This is exactly what I need to fight off the darkness of night.|L|I must have it.

comment_give_TAG_monovai_part.dialog: You would dare return this part of me?

comment_give_I_void_glyph.dialog: You would dare to give me a drawing in my own likeness?

comment_give_quick.dialog: This will remind me of you, while it lasts.

comment_give_burden.dialog: There are consequences for looking at me like that.

comment_give_starter.dialog: Taking this from you would leave me with an impossible debt.

give_confirm.dialog: Do you want to give this to me?

gift_given.dialog_rand1: You have given me something that I wanted.
gift_given.dialog_rand2: You have made me so happy with this gift.
gift_given.dialog_rand3: You have shown me kindness beyond anything I've ever known.

gift_given.dialog_rand1: Your kindness will not go unpunished.
gift_given.dialog_rand2: I will have my revenge for this.
gift_given.dialog_rand3: Are you prepared for the consequences?
gift_given.dialog_rand4: You have forced me to retaliate.

special_given.dialog_rand1: This light will help me see at night.
special_given.dialog_rand2: The light is even brighter coming from you.
special_given.dialog_rand3: I won't be scared-|L||!||shake|I mean, I will be able to see in the dark.

special_given.dialog_rand1: You will be held responsible for this.
special_given.dialog_rand3: You will receive retribution for this.

TAG_monovai_part_given.dialog: This is a very dangerous part of me, and you have just returned it to where it belongs.
You must understand that there will be consequences for this.

I_void_glyph_given.dialog: You have some nerve giving me this lovely work of art.
It captures my figure so well.
My retribution will be swift and merciless.

leave_blank.dialog: I'm scared of the dark too.|L||!|You don't have to hide it from me.
You dare make me comfortable expressing my vulnerabilities?
I sentence you to this inescapable embrace.

leave_defect.dialog: I will now sentence each of you to one embrace from me.
I will have retribution for your compliments.

leave_twins.dialog: It was nice to see you, Monovai.
Your visit has filled me with so much love, but it is now time to cast my judgement upon you.

leave_devil.dialog: You dare give me a free embrace?|L||!|You will pay for this.
I'll get you back for this!
You have now accrued an impossible debt to me.

leave_default.dialog: Your visit has made me feel less alone.
